1260550.name: Hot Air Balloon Simulator
1260550.description:
Fly in a smoke-powered air balloon across a 64 square kllometers landscape with different biomes. Massive open world, beautiful locations to explore. Chop trees and collect wood in order to power your air balloon. Basic character customization, true first person view. Just fly around beautiful places and experience beauty of nature in this meditative experience, with emphasis on relaxation and exploration

Features:

-Control the hot air baloon. Make sure to maintain fire in the oven so that it won't fall

-Beautiful graphics

-Big open world with different biomes to explore (1 huge 64 square kilometers level to explore)

-First and third person view

-Chop trees

-Read public domain books while you travel, surrounded by nature (currently only 1 book available), by pressing B, or by looking at a book and pressing E to interact
